titleStmt.title: By the king. A proclamation for the putting in execution of the several laws now in force, relating to His Majesties revenue of excise.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd: and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Windsor the twentieth day of June 1683. In the five and thirtieth year of our reign.
Steele notation: Arms 92 day Farms 2) Our Employments,.
Item at reel C18:2[193] filmed twice.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
